entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @HHS_ASH Bullshit! But back on March 6th @realDonaldTrump said “Anybody that wants a test (for the coronavirus) can get a test.” that was a flat out lie at that time. #TrumpPressConf #TrumpMeltdown #TrumpCoronavirusTestFailure #TrumpLiesAmericansDie
